ygData.subject: Re: Screaming Mace Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: I do not think they are part of the mace quest. All you need to get the mace is a Crush tunic from Crush and a battle bracer from the warlord. The molds might
ygData.messageBody:
I do not think they are part of the mace quest. All you need to get the mace
is a Crush tunic from Crush and a battle bracer from the warlord. The molds
might be to another quest.

Chris aka Thunderheart
Level 21
Wood-Elf
Druid
Innoruuk server
---=== Divine Wind ===---



-----Original Message-----
From: kale usi [mailto:kaleusi@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 03, 1999 7:27 AM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Screaming Mace Quest


From: kale usi <kaleusi@...>

Anyone out there know if, and how the blade and maul mold are used (the ones

that may be obtained off of the screaming mace quest)?
